duration.description: How long did the query took to run in seconds.

users.description: List of users who ran this query.

vote.description: Users can vote up to rank the popular queries.

checksum.description: Checksum to avoid registering duplicate queries.

queryDate.description: Date on which the query ran.

name.description: Name of a entity to which the query belong

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this query.

queryUsage.description: list of entities to which the query is joined.

entityName.description: Name of an entity to which the query belongs, to create fqn for eg: checksum.entityName
